item.title: About
item.description: Hell-O there My name is Roarrraor the pixelated black cat who wants to represent a memory of the 90s through 8-bit animated characters and I’m really excited to share with you, how-to’s and inspiration whirling around in my head is ready to jump out. I wanted to start by telling you why I created this blog, what you will be seeing more of in my posts, and my overall experience of revamping my website.

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?
